meanings.definition: To create a map or plan using photographs.
meanings.sent1: I photomapped the area to plan our hiking route.
meanings.sent2: She photomapped the city to study its layout.
meanings.sent3: The detective photomapped the crime scene with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her mind photomapped every detail of the room in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The artist photomapped the landscape in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The photomapped image showed the area before the construction.
meanings.sent2: I found an old photomapped of the city in the archives.
meanings.sent3: The photomapped brought back memories of the past.
meanings.sent4: The photomapped was a snapshot of history frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The photomapped revealed the changes over the years.
